Marianne Kriel (amụrụ na 30 ọnwa Ọgọstụ,  na afọ 1971 na Bellville, Western Cape) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri n'azụ azụ na freestyle si South Africa, onye ritere ọla nchara na 100m backstroke na 1996 Summer Olympics na Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ nọrọ oge ụfọdụ na-azụ onwe ya na Southern Methodist University (SMU) ebe ọ zutere ezigbo ndị enyi Tia Gibson na ụmụ ya nwanyị Meg na Katie.
Kriel sonyekwara na 1992 Summer Olympics na Barcelona, Spain, ma nata onyinye onye isi ala na 1993 na 1996
Kriel bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi otu ọtụtụ koodu na 1994 Commonwealth Games na 1995 All-Africa Games.
Kriel tolitere na Bellville (nke dị nso na Cape Town) ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Bellville
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ ihe nlereanya nye ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya nke agbụrụ na nzụlite niile, n'ụzọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịdị n'otu nke ndị ntorobịa South Africa.
